Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi bowled a beauty hitting the timber off the 2nd delivery getting rid of debutant Tim Robinson.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan named Babar Azam as the white-ball captain after Shaheen Shah Afridi was removed from the captaincy.
Pakistan included Mohammad Aamir in the playing XI after he decided to step down from retirement.
Pakistan named three debutants for the first T20I match including Muhammad Irfan Khan, Usman Khan, and Abrar Ahmed.
Tim Robinson made his debut for New Zealand in the first encounter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The first T20I match between New Zealand and Pakistan at Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium ended in a no-result due to consistent rains on 18th April 2024.
The match did not start due to persistent rains and was reduced to 5 overs game.
Both teams would look to play the same XI in the 2nd match and hope to see a full match.
Pakistan will play T20I matches against England and Ireland before the T20 World Cup.
